review: Ads really ruin the experience while watching a video.
I understand that video creators would like to earn money from video they posted, but putting them in the middle of the videos just ruin the experience.
Every time when I am in the middle of the video and the ads comes in, I immediately leave the post and just move on, no matter how interesting that video is.
So, in order for them to earn money, I suggest the ads just put below their caption, or particularly on their page timeline.

I did find another way to click into the link, which is to copy the link and paste it on safari and go.

I like using fb but I believe the user experience can be improved tremendously just by fixing the bugs I mentioned above.

I,ve been using Facebook for many years..

A few days before, my account suddenly logged out in the Facebook apps on my iPhone.
And now, I can't access my own account.
It keep on having security check everytime I'm trying to sign in.

For an example, the apps ask me to enter my birthdate on the security check interface, I do entered my birthday but it keep saying that i,ve entered the wrong birthdate eventhough I've entered my own birthdate which the same date on my account.
What the heck is happening?.
I had a tons of important stuff and connections on Facebook.
This has ruined my day.
I'm used to be a huge fan of Facebook and I'm always able to access my account before.
My Facebook account have been hacked, and I have a Page inside that account, which I used to run ads regularly on.
After hackers gained access into my account, they hacked my Page and I received an unauthorized charge on my bank account.
I was billed with a whopping RM4000 (approx 1000USD).
I have never run ads that expensive in my whole life.
I have since submitted 4 tickets to Facebook to ask for help within the duration of 10 days.
Every single time I did, they told me that they will reply in 2-3 days.
It's been more than a week now.
Still no reply.
No need to take care of "small" users like us.

review: Okay so I‚Äôve updated my fb app yesterday and thought I could have some improvements towards some features of facebook but it ended up having nothing and the feature wherein you could watch a video while you view a comment on it as well as skipping 10 seconds back or forward of the video is now gone.
The only improvement i see is the episode feature where you can see the title now.

But, some videos which are not in an episode mode,it just all went back to the basic feature of facebook where you can just scroll down and when you view some comments, it overshadows the video you‚Äôre watching.
I hope this is just a bug coz I really love the past update where I can easily watch a video while I can view some comments and see some upcoming videos to watch.
The recent updates made to the app just made everything look cluttered.
Recently, it can‚Äôt even get my location right so I am unable to post on Facebook groups.

On a different note, it is so disappointing to see that this company has proven that it DOES NOT CARE about its users, as in the philippines there has been a surge in the creation of fake accounts, propagated by the country‚Äôs corrupt administration through paid trolls.
I‚Äôve reported dozens (probably hundreds) of my friends‚Äô fake accounts but upon reviewing you did not see any ‚Äúviolation‚Äù to your policies.

Your algorithm should‚Äôve picked up the abnormal behavior in the philippines wherein dozens of accounts were made under the same names, but different profile URLs (and using the same format at that).
I hope you made a lot of money with our data, if so why putting so many advert that looks like posts.
Advert advert are everywhere.

I‚Äôm using Facebook since 10 years now, and the simplicity of the system was great : ‚Äúbut before‚Äù
You could stay in contact with albanese people posting in albanese, with New Zealander people posting in English, everything was made for you to keep the people you traveled with, to keep in touch even if you don‚Äôt understand fully their language.
Now with the bubble it is a nightmare, Facebook is putting your mind a bubble, in a cage, in a prison, depending on your moods and the news.
I tough Facebook was social, and I discovered it was political.

Go back to basics 

Bye

It has come to the attention of a wide span of Facebook users that their dupe or personal account has been disable by Facebook itself.
I, for one have also been disabled on my personal account, containing a lot of fond memories and school works that I would need badly if I don't recover my account.
I have appealed numerous times ever since I received the notice and up to this day still no avail.

To even add insult to injury the message I get every time I submit an appeal is "Information cannot be submitted" and "Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) there are limited personnel that are able to review your appeal at Facebook".
Hi, I absolutely love this app and I‚Äôve been using this for more than a decade now.
I find it very useful in may ways but most especially when it comes to connecting with my friends and love ones.

But it will be much more satisfying if this app will be updated with new features where you don‚Äôt need to press and choose how much resolution you‚Äôll use to watch a video, I mean, where you can upload clips where the resolution of the video doesn‚Äôt change at all... but a bit changes is quite acceptable but below triple times the original resolution?
it is quite unsatisfying... ü•∫
It could help those parents that are far away from their kids to connect more, rather than letting kids using their uncles/aunties or granny‚Äôs fb account.
Your fact checkers assigned to our country are biased.

They use their position/role to further their own political agendas and work on silencing anyone who opposes them by banning their profiles and taking down their posts even if it didn‚Äôt violated any of their rules.
So long as it doesn‚Äôt confirm with the said fact checkers political beliefs they will ban the profile or take down the posts.
They don‚Äôt even listen to petitions or requests to lift the ban regardless if you provided sufficient evidences to support your claim.

I‚Äôve lost hope on FB/ Meta correcting this because of their connection and same ideologies with their respective fact checkers  but I just want to put it out there in case someone is experiencing the same thing in their own country.
Posts regarding #FreePalestine are being unfairly deleted.
Where is our right to free speech?

News platforms are only covering the Israeli struggles and shrugging off the truth of the Palestinian genocide by the Zionist government of Israel, and now giant social media platforms by Facebook including Twitter and Instagram are also stripping us off our right to freely spread the truth behind the media sugarcoating of the Israeli terrorism.
I experienced the same ‚ÄúAn unexpected error occurred.
Try logging in again blah, blah‚Äù .
After countless times of deleting and reinstalling and restarting my iphone but still ZERO success, I tried clicking the ‚ÄúSIGN UP‚Äù thinking of just making a new fb account.
Lo and behold, instead of a new, empty fb account, it redirected me to my original, old fb account insteadüò±.
But the old posts on my news feed keeps on showing, the posts that are from a week ago or worst, posts that are 2 weeks ago.
It doesn‚Äôt update me the recent posts.
Can you fix this bug?
I already typed a comment and reacted to those posts but everytime I refresh my news feed, the posts were still the ones who will show up.
What is wrong with you facebook?!
Why keep showing me old posts?!
I already tried to log out my account, turn off my phone, uninstall and reinstall the app, refresh everything but still, nothing works!!!
And also why do I only see the posts from a few friends when I have almost 3,000 friends on my list!
This is frustrating!!!
Thank you for letting me express what matters to me.

As of writing, it‚Äôs #FreePalestine #FreePalestine #FreePalestine

P.S giving you a 3-star for those updates (e.g videos) i could partly scroll and watch re what‚Äôs happening here and there.
I really loved using Facebook, there‚Äôs no day I skipped using it.
I also loved every updates on this app, but it would be very much great if I can upload my videos took on my phone in HD mode.
Because each videos I uploaded turned out to be pixelated even if the graphics were all good when I played it on my phone.
After the successful upload, the whole video looks like a crap.

But the rest of the navigation and all are perfectly fine for me.
Facebook is very great and useful app especially in this time of global pandemic.

Very disappointed in the choices of FB - as a powerful tech giant, you have a SOCIAL RESPONSIBILTY to let people make their voices heard and expose the genocide happening in Palestine - you are willingly and actively contributing to the oppression and apartheid by selectively censoring FACTUAL content (e.g., live videos of Palestinians under attack).
Social media is a power tool for the oppressed to make their voices heard and mobilise people/protests.
It is literally their only weapon and if you take it away from them you are helping cover up for their massacre.
Facebook was used to organise protests and overthrow dictators in the past years, which proves that it is a powerful tool to empower oppressed people and help achieve social justice.
Please don‚Äôt take away from people their voices, the only thing they have left.

Even my business facebook account has racked up $350 worth of charges, but i cannot access or report this because of my disabled fb account.
I can understand that as a free usage social media platform, Facebook needs to earn from the advertisement, but you‚Äôre getting too greedy.

i love how easy it is to use this app and it makes contacting your loved once just as simple as a click away but there are a few things i‚Äôm having problems with and some of these i believe are caused by bugs.

firstly, the ‚Äúactive‚Äù feature doesn‚Äôt work on my account even if i try logging into other devices, people who i‚Äôm pretty sure are active and talking to me at the moment don‚Äôt show up as ‚Äúactive‚Äù but instead shows up as ‚Äúactive 1 min ago‚Äù and when someone messages you, you automatically become ‚Äúactive‚Äù for example, you‚Äôre asleep but you receive a message from somebody, that person will think you‚Äôre active because messenger marks you as ‚Äúactive‚Äù even if you are nowhere near your device.
secondly, in the middle of calls i‚Äôm having, messenger suddenly ends it even if my wi-fi connection is working just fine and so is the person on the other line‚Äôs connection.
thirdly, this has been happening to me most of the time and my friends as well, the ellipsis that shows that the person is typing is usually just a glitch.
it shows that the person is typing when they‚Äôre actually not which makes the receiver unhappy because they think that they‚Äôre going to be receiving a message when it turns out to be false.
lastly, the chat streak feature suddenly disappeared even though you messaged that certain person within the 24-hour period.
i hope you could address these problems as soon as possible because many of us users are having trouble with these issues.

review: Lately messenger has been very buggy.
My friends and I are considering to chat on other platforms instead.

Bugs
1.

2.

Usually I don‚Äôt write product reviews, but since messenger the app I use most often besides Facebook, I had to, because this version is like the developer decided to delete all their progress and start again from zero.

Here are some things I found that need to be fixed:
- Live Location not actually live
- I can‚Äôt make ‚ÄúPlans‚Äù anymore
- Editing of photos/videos.

Other, more frivolous things:
- Your new emojis are ugly
- Why can‚Äôt I send big emoji instead of normal sized emoji
- The basketball/football games are gone??
Anyway I just don‚Äôt get why they would put so many features in and then take them away  if they actually make sense and they add more functionality.
I enjoyed using Messenger in its previous versions but man every time I find something that‚Äôs been taken away I get more and more upset.
Mine and my wife‚Äôs Facebook messengers got hacked.
Scams using our names are actively ongoing.
I am not able to regain control on the messengers.
Even after I had deactivated the Facebook account, the scammer can still use my messenger to communicate with our contacts.
A contact in our Facebook fell victim to the scam, she believed we were communicating with her.
They gain access to her bank and withdrew all her savings.
I decided to delete both accounts.
Too bad, all my photo albums will be lost.
I hope the messenger app gets cancelled after I have the Facebook account deleted.
I refused to activate the messenger app.
I refused to let Facebook gain access to my mobile contacts.
It will be a disaster.
I am very certain many Facebook users who got hacked face challenges getting their identity back.
Apple should not permit this app until Facebook provide options for us to regain access to the messenger app.
In the help community, you are told to call some overseas phone number to reach for help.
This is ridiculous, can you imagine anyone willing to bear such costs.

review: The App has always been buggy since Feb 2020, and it's amusing how the review score on Appstore is 4.4.
The photo upload function and gif has been so broken that you need to force close the app and reopen it every single time you're sending any of them.
Otherwise what you get is just a black screen.
The app‚Äôs great and all.

But one thing that really annoys me is the fact that when I have a chat window open and I switch to another app after replying (without pressing the ‚Äú<Home‚Äù button), the app will not notify me of new messages within that conversation.
It‚Äôs not an app-breaking thing but it‚Äôs really annoying.

I recently started using messenger more often but encountered some problems like: display picture not changing to the current one, shows that I was online even though I wasn‚Äôt, not being able to playback some audios.
Please fix this ASAP.
Other than that I still enjoy using the app.
Its convenient is currently the best way to connect with my friends.

But... 
Why can‚Äôt I see ‚ÄúMy Story‚Äù on messenger?
But on other people‚Äôs messenger, they can view n add to ‚ÄúMy Story‚Äù directly from Messenger.
Whereas, I can only view and post from Facebook.
After I minimize the video chat, it cannot be maximize back.
There seems to be a lag when someone does an action in Watch Together.
It is really annoying.
So far, it‚Äôs a great app.
Thanks for all the hard works done.

I‚Äôve been on Instagram since 2013 and the algorithm for what posts show up on the explore page gets worse by the year.
No matter how many times I mark a post or story with ‚ÄúNot Interested‚Äù, it‚Äôll always show up on my explore.
The reason I‚Äôm writing this review now is because I keep seeing this one specific story on my explore page of a laser facial being done on a person and it looks absolutely disgusting.
The dermatologist attempting the facial uses a long needle that burns the person‚Äôs skin, leaving red bumps all over their face.
It‚Äôs so unpleasant to look at and I physically retch every time I see it, but no matter how many times I hide it from my page it always ends up on my explore from another bot account.
I can‚Äôt even report the posts because it doesn‚Äôt really violate any of Instagram‚Äôs rules.
I always try to mark posts or stories from spam/bot accounts with ‚ÄúNot Interested‚Äù but the algorithm always manages to bring it back somehow.
I hate what the app‚Äôs become now because of this.
With this algorithm I really wouldn‚Äôt recommend this social media app to anyone looking to join an online community, because the spam and bots just tend to clog up the searches and explore page.

review: It was a nice move for Instagram to remove the total number of likes a photo has gotten in their recent test update here in Canada.

I know that responsible usage of the app is a must, but if only instagram would make more mental health-friendly features like this, I think social media would be less toxic and healthy for everyone.

Like make our saved filters appear on our videos and pictures on our camera roll as well

Social media is toxic as it is, and the feature alone isn't adding contributions to lessening today's personal issues.

review: I think overall its a vv well developed app.
However I think the story creation function has room for improvement.
For example, when there r many elements on the screen, it is hard to position them/control what layer they r on.
When I tap one element it selects an element close-by(sometimes q far away actually) instead.
I think a solution could be to hold on an element and have its position locked, and when u double tap, a menu comes up where u can control if u want to ‚Äúmove forward/back‚Äù in terms of layers.

This way, it doesn‚Äôt vv visibly add new functions so it doesn‚Äôt increase complexity for new users, but it gives added freedom for more experienced users/ppl trying to create more professional stories.
Thanks for ur attention, hope this can help in improving the app.

Bugs fixed and improvements were made but these stuffs weren‚Äôt even available on a lot of people‚Äôs phone.
Secondly, i heard of the way you all place our post like you will show 10% of our followers our recent posts and hide from 90% of our followers, which is really tragic.
We would really like to have it back in the old instagram way where we get all the latest posts and not miss out of all the newest posts by our friends, celebrities and all !
If these improvements were made, it would make all the instagram users happier because we all love the old instagram!
We definitely love all the cool new features but changing this much really makes a huge difference in our impression for instagram.
Thankyou üôÇ
You keep changing everything about the app that was perfectly good, such as the news feed and likes.
Not to mention the ‚Äúthis action has been restricted to protect our community‚Äù message.
I created a new Instagram account a couple months ago and started following all my friends (as one would do) and celebrities.
Next thing I know, my account was banned for ‚Äòmass following‚Äô and I haven‚Äôt been able to login since.
Why am I being punished for being social on social media?
Is there an algorithm in place to test if I‚Äôm a bot?
Or is this simply random.
I googled this and there are many other people who have had the exact same problem from comments dating back to TWO YEARS AGO!
I‚Äôm not trying to be unreasonable here but can we just have the old Instagram back?
The one where I could follow all my friends without repercussions.

It‚Äôs really difficult to really see my friends‚Äô posts when everything is not in chronological order, most of the time I see posts from the same people when I really want to see everyone‚Äôs posts (that‚Äôs the point of following them) like in the old days of Instagram.
Please please PLEASE look into this matter.

The new Instagram Stories updates etc are cool and all but just give us back the chronological feed because I‚Äôm really not the first person to bring this up and the new feed is actually making me use Instagram less because I don‚Äôt even get to see most of the content in real time.

PLEASE do something and bring back the chronological feed, I swear it‚Äôll do Instagram so much good - algorithms and advertisers are one thing, but listening to your actual users is very important too.

Now, I‚Äôd really love to say all the good things about Instagram.
The instagram community in general is quite friendly with the exception of well... some people...
Over the past 2-3 years of managing a fanpage on Instagram, I have encountered 2 major problems involving the deletion of my account.
There were also an uncountable amount of other minor-ish problems which involved things like, Random blocking of actions and deletion of my posts that were not even violating community guidelines.
Until today, I have no idea of the real reason of why my 2 of my accounts were deleted.
This is because, despite numerous attempts to contact Instagram support, I have not received a single reply from any staff.
I feel that Instagram is very cold and it‚Äôs customer service is almost non-existent.
The only times I‚Äôve seen Instagram staff ‚Äòsupposedly‚Äô in action was when they went around deleting fan pages.
Many of the owners of those fan pages had become my closes online friends on Instagram, and to see their accounts just disappear like that was really saddening.
I‚Äôd recommend Instagram if you‚Äôre willing to take the risk of having your effort on your page go to waste should you ‚Äòviolate Instagram guidelines‚Äô.

Stories

üò° Very annoying please fix this.
Apart from this, my stories keep getting posted twice... Like an unedited version and an edited version.

Unable to load my posts

There have been posts that have clearly violated the rules - bullying, harassment, having someone who constantly target another account, calling and insulting them through multiple posts, gathering their followers to spam the accounts they don‚Äôt like and this clearly doesn‚Äôt violate Instagram‚Äôs definition of bullying or harassment.
Giving methods of suicide, promoting different ways of self-harming clearly didn‚Äôt violate their rules either.
What actually constitutes as inappropriate to you?
If these clear cut offenses doesn‚Äôt, I cannot imagine what posts you would bring down.
Even if repeat offenders are being reported for the same thing, the only thing you can do is to take down their posts?
Seriously?
You need to improve your reporting system and guidelines.
It is no longer a safe community for users of different age, and for different people because of your lack of regulation.
Frankly, we love instagram, but with the double standard exercised by your workers which are uncalled for is mind boggling.
Please if you want people to follow your guidelines for the sake of the community, you should also be aware of your own doings.
We find that with your exercises as such, many people are getting upset and they will revenge on one another.
You emphasize on positivity, but you aren‚Äôt instilling positivities among the people, you‚Äôre instilling hate among them!
If you re so concerned about your community then you should grow a pair of sharp eyes and check the posts properly, not removing posts when you don‚Äôt check them.
Once you have agreed they don‚Äôt violate, you have to stick through and not when users put the post up in their stories, you receive reports, you remove the stories and not the posts thereafter ok?!
Instagram, you are giving a lot of people headache!
I rarely give Low ratings but please change back the formatting.
It‚Äôs causing more inconvenience which can be really disturbing.
I keep questioning myself ain‚Äôt Instagram a social media platform?
It‚Äôs so troublesome right now to read the comments, it‚Äôs so hidden at the corner?
Isn‚Äôt it like a main function?

I‚Äôm sure I didn‚Äôt intend to download a shopping app when l downloaded Instagram, l‚Äôm alright with happing a shopping function cos l‚Äôm sure some may be interested but it shouldn‚Äôt be taking over the original main purposes.
It is the one that should be at the corner for accessing!

This update is really disappointing and please either restore the highlight functions back at their place or come up with something better.

Dear Instagram Makers, 
 Frequently, when I am ‚Äúdirect messaging‚Äù my friends or family members, I will always encounter this bug.
The bug where Instagram says they are texting when they are not.
In all honesty, I find Instagram very good.

I like how I can surf through things that are going through in the world and how I can find out what my friends are doing and how I can keep up with them similarly to Whatsapp and other social interactive applications.
However, I am highly dissatisfied with the ‚Äúdirect messaging‚Äù system.
Whenever I text someone and they‚Äôre replying, Instagram says that the other person is texting however when I exit the chat or the application ‚Äî it stops.
The person in reality is not even texting.
I‚Äôm writing this as I am pretty sure many people experience this issue.
I have asked my other friends and families if they have this issue and their answer will always be yes.
So on others behalf, I hope you take this into consideration as this bug really gets on people‚Äôs nerves.
Thank you.

review: Over the past few days, I have reported several comments that have been personally attacking and harassing me and no action has been taken by Instagram to remove the comments because they ‚Äúdo not violate community guidelines‚Äù.
Why in the world would I report a comment if I did not felt like it was threatening my safety and privacy??

Utterly disappointed and abhorred by how Instagram is so quick to remove seemingly harmless content but refuses to remove a comment for me because they do not feel like there is anything wrong when I clearly feel threatened.
So much talk about protecting the community and I have even written in about this issue and yet no action nor response.

Ends up my second account got disabled and there‚Äôs no way I could send a report to retrieve that account back, stating that there‚Äôs a problem with the process.

Instagram should be about being able to see posts that users really wish to see.

Get your act together and allow users to choose the type of feed that suits them most.

My account was blocked yesterday saying that I have violated the platform rules for example involving in malicious marketing, harassment or fraud but the thing is I was only using the app for communication.
I have asked at least 5 of the people that I know who weren‚Äôt my WeChat friends to help me to settle this issue.
However all of them met the same problem which is saying that they do not meet the requirements to help a friend log in or it says that they also have unusual activity in their app.
This is a serious malfunction in your system.
In 2018, I have met the same problem also and it was about the same reason of why my account was blocked.

Therefore I have a few questions to ask your team and hoping for a proper reply:
1) How does your team processes the system and blocks someone account?
2) If you‚Äôre going to block someone‚Äôs account, do you have any proof that proves that I have used my account and to be involved in such activities ?
3) Why does my account got blocked for all of a sudden giving me such weird reasons that says I used the app to be involved in such activities ?
4) How does your team choose to block a user‚Äôs account ?
Is it because someone reported the account or it‚Äôs just your system having problem and being unlucky to meet up with this malfunction in the system?

Due to the title, apparently a month ago I found that there is a font size problem in WhatsApp.
This problem occurs everytime when I was/am looking at my contacts‚Äô status.
I use small font size setting for my phone and usually the WhatsApp will use that font size.
It was good until I discovered that the font size on my status and other contact‚Äôs status keep changing.
Sometimes the font size is normal, sometimes the font size is too small and sometimes the font size is too bigger.

I don‚Äôt know how to describe this problem but if I scroll through all of my contact‚Äôs status, for example if they upload 3 status, first status the font size is normal, next the second status the font size is magically too much bigger, then I went back to the first status, it‚Äôs suddenly become really small, then the second status become really small too, finally the third status the font size become really big.
Personally, this font size problem is really annoying me as I prefer to use small font size so I would like to have small font size just like my settings for iphone.
Apparently, I thought that this was my phone‚Äôs problem, then I realized that my friends who use iphone are also having this font size problem.
I discovered that this problem occurs after the launch of ios 14 updates for iphone.
Sorry for my bad English, the app is good but I really hope you can fix this issue.
Thank you in advance.

Dear developers, I have been using WhatsApp for a very long time and I always prefer WhatsApp than any other communication applications.
However since last week (1st October), I have been facing an annoying tone bug when using WhatsApp.
I always have my iPhone ringtone and volume at the lowest level.
However, when I try to send a voice message, cancel a voice message and take photo using WhatsApp, the tone effect immediately play at the max level (which is very annoying).
Some more, when I‚Äôm receiving in-app-message, the first notification tone ring at a normal level.
But the second notification tone suddenly raised to the maximum.
I have tried to look for latest version to keep my WhatsApp updated.
And even tried to uninstall and reinstall it.
But the problem still exist.
When I try to use the functions mentioned above on instagram and Facebook messenger, non of the mentioned problem arisen.
Please fix this bug as soon as possible.
Thank you in advance üôèüèº
Really hate to have to come to the AppStore to file a complaint but here it is.
So recently I had an issue with my group calls that won‚Äôt silent when I swipe away or press the side buttons.

When I explained that I still wanted to be notified, your team asked for a video to demonstrate my problem, which I so freely sent in.
But for the past 3 emails exchange, you have been asking me to click on a button within WhatsApp to report my problem again, which obviously doesn‚Äôt solve my original issue.
At this rate, I‚Äôm really not hoping for any help but I‚Äôm extremely disappointed and I wish to let your users know here.

You are the pioneers amongst other social media/chat room apps and has the most users worldwide, but is way behind in terms of media sharing option.
My work phone provided by company is using Whatsapp to communicate with our clients.

Our company sometimes prepared media files to share with our clients such as gif files (for birthday etc)but once we shared through whatsapp, the files was heavily compressed and reach to clients with the lowest quality.
The gif files became mostly pixelated and this has a bad impact to our company image.
Hence we have to stop sharing any special media to our clients as most clients only using whatsapp & we have no other choice but to keep using this room to communicate.
But the communication has less impact as clients mostly won‚Äôt respond to a plain texts from us.

I rarely use the word ‚Äòmessage‚Äô nowadays as I use ‚ÄòWhatsApp‚Äô instead.
As example ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt forget to Whatsapp me bout the details‚Äù.

Thus, if I happened to stay up passed my bed time I rather stay up all night than sleep and miss the time to notify people.
It brings me to the edge of my bed!.
So if Whatsapp can add scheduled message feature, it would be highly appreciated and very useful for people like me!

review: Is it possible to enforce a way to make it less enticing for users to hide their Last Seen status?
Or at least encourage quid pro quo in terms of sharing one‚Äôs last seen?
Viber users can change their Online / Last Seen setting only once every 24 hrs.
Currently, if you don't share your last seen, you won't be able to see other contacts‚Äô last seen.
However, you can also as easily make your last seen visible again and immediately see the last seen of your contacts who share their last seen, and then simply go back to hide your last seen again.
This is great if I were one of those invisible users who wishes to be private and hide my last seen, yet be able to see most of my contacts‚Äô last seen anytime.
But on the flip side, this seems so unfair to users who keep their last seen transparent, not to mention making them vulnerable to potentially sneaky behavior by ‚Äúhidden‚Äù users.
Though it is reliable and quick, one disturbing bug is that read messages keep appearing in iPhone‚Äôs notification, even after they are dismissed several times.
Apart from the feedback mentioned above, there are also other areas which I find could improve.
This mainly concerns the backup process of history chats.
It would be good if only chats that hasn‚Äôt been backed up could be backup, rather than backing every single chat up and causing a lag in phones.
Which brings me to my next point, my iOS lags badly whenever a backup is going on, which affects not only WhatsApp but other applications.
My last point - I‚Äôve set the settings so that my chats could be backed up daily, but it isn‚Äôt getting daily backups.
I have updated IOS 11.2.2 two days ago and from then my messages are not sync properly.

I get notification or an alert that I have a received a message >> then I go folder I can see symbol on WhatsApp icon that I have received it >> then I select the app but inside no new message >> immediately I can see app got hung for few seconds then it will start sync the message after 10 seconds..
Here I have to wait for minimum 5 to 10 seconds.. if I didn‚Äôt see WhatsApp message for longer time then the hangs time bit more.
I have restarted twice the iphone but still I face the same problem.
Please help to check and fix it ASAP.

review: Please look into making it easier and faster to delete the last message sent.
When a message is sent incorrectly, we need to be able to quickly delete it before it is seen by the receiver.

I first have to hold on the message, then drop down the menu to ‚ÄúMore‚Äù, then tap ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù, then tap the ‚Äúbin icon‚Äù and finally choose whether I want to ‚ÄúDelete for me‚Äù or ‚ÄúDelete for everyone‚Äù.

review: WhatsApp messages nowadays are widely used by corporate sectors as part of their daily commercial dealings where WhatsApp messages at times are being used as a written evidence on any contractual agreements.

But when you introduced this disappearing messages into this latest update, I began to wonder what are the usefulness of this feature other than to create unnecessary anxiety when receiving important messages not knowing whether they will disappear or just another funny tool amongst friends.
In honesty, you are better off with no updates than to provide this useless update for the sake of updates.
Disappointment from a long time WhatsApp user.
I think I will try to convince all my commercial associates to move away from WhatsApp to something more logical.
This app is really convenient but I would like to add a suggestion.
Maybe add a ‚ÄùDisable Status‚Äù so some people would not get unnecessary notifications from his/her friends‚Äô new status updates.
I think by doing this, it may be of great use to some people.
And by ‚ÄùDisabling Status‚Äù you would not be able to post anything, see any of your friends‚Äô status updates, or receive any unnecessary notification.
Thank you very much.

...I'm surprised that not to many people brought up data privacy issues with this app, considering its ownership shifting to Facebook.
Facebook users beware: This app WILL communicate with the Facebook app in the background and use your conversations on WhatsApp to show targeted ads.
If you haven't done so already, there are settings that can be changed to eliminate this issue.

It's bad enough that Facebook has openly admitted to selling their userbase's data to dubious buyers, so hopefully more people put two and two together and realise that their conversations, however encrypted, are being monitored and farmed unless they do something about it.

review: What I hate the most is the little mini screen that you have to *Slide Down* instead of sliding to the side like it used to be.
I have grown used to the old way and when you changed it, it's just annoying because I kept forgetting to slide down and not side ways.
Also, sometimes when I DO slide down, I need to try a couple of times because it won't work right away.
Second, I wish that you could fix the lag because my screen would suddenly freeze.
I don't know if that just happens on my IPad because on my phone it's pretty fine.
Sometimes when watching a video there is audio but no video playing, otherwise it‚Äôs video buffering even before it has started when watching even with good internet speed and coverage.
Please fix ASAP.

This app has everything I need and is great in terms of functionality, except for two things (Two stars for the rating).
Offline capabilities and background music capabilities.

I have a lot of music in my playlists, and a lot of work to do on my phone, and I love to listen to music WHILE using my phone, so it would be beyond helpful to be able to listen to music while using other apps.
Anyways, that‚Äôs my review, and I hope you‚Äôll take these into account.
After selecting the video quality, video does not automatically buffer to the selected quality.
Before it would load straight away in the chosen quality with the loading icon, and now it takes a few seconds with no loading icon.
Also, default video quality is always at a minimum e.g(240p,360p) quality should vary by internet speed and default quality should be able to be set by user.
Please implement this ASAP, as I believe it would greatly benefit us users as well as fill up the missing 1 star of my review of this app.
Thanks!
